summary: The diff implements multiple responsive-layout improvements (global overflow prevention, responsive Section gutters/padding, responsive Home/About/Contact/Offers/Menu layouts, responsive header/footer). However, the Menu Management page responsiveness requirements are not clearly evidenced in the provided MenuManagementPage.tsx diff snippet. The diff summary also indicates several unrequested feature additions/expansions (e.g., Gallery page/lightbox, SEO/meta updates, brand asset centralization, and large menu data refactor).

missing_requirements.requirement: Make the Menu Management page responsive, including the tab list, forms, and action buttons, so it remains usable on mobile and tablet (no tabs or form inputs extending off-screen).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff excerpt for MenuManagementPage.tsx shows logic and imports but does not show any responsive layout adjustments (e.g., TabsList wrapping/scrolling behavior, responsive form grid stacking, or responsive primary action button layout). Because the file content is truncated, there is insufficient evidence that the responsive UI changes required by REQ-4 were implemented.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/MenuManagementPage.tsx (truncated; no visible responsive class changes for tabs/forms/actions)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified a Gallery page with responsive image grid and click-to-preview lightbox functionality.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states non-goals include adding new pages or new business features unrelated to responsive layout; a Gallery page/lightbox is not part of the listed routes/pages to make responsive (Home, About, Menu, Offers, Contact, Menu Management).

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded SEO meta-tag updates and a dynamic Seo helper component for document title/Open Graph tags.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is focused on responsiveness; SEO/meta tag work is not requested and is outside the stated scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Large refactor/expansion of menu data (standardized 15 categories and 200+ items) unrelated to responsive layout.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for menu content/data changes; it focuses on responsive layout only and notes backend/schema should remain unchanged unless blocking.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions "frontend/src/data/menuData.ts" complete standardized menu data and 200+ items)

hallucinated_features.description: Centralized brand asset paths and modified brand-related components with additional error handling/fallback behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the responsiveness-focused BuildRequest; these are functional/structural changes beyond layout responsiveness.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified URL parameter utilities and added search deep-link focus behavior to Menu page beyond responsiveness.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request new navigation/search behaviors; it is specifically about responsive layout.
